Article.ArticleTitle: Aquatic Food Products: Processing Technology and Quality Control.

Abstract.AbstractText: Aquatic products have the characteristics of high protein, low fat, and good nutritional balance, and they have become an important source of support to solve world hunger and nutritional deficiencies [...].

AffiliationInfo.Affiliation: State Key Laboratory of Marine Food Processing & Safety Control, Dalian Polytechnic University, Dalian 116034, China.

MedlineCitation.CoiStatement: The authors declare no conflicts of interest.
